content: this crochet ghost keychain works up quick and uses a minimal amount of yarn perfect for getting rid of that scrap yarn the ghost can be made in a variety of colors materials i used keychain version * worsted weight yarn * 4 mm hook * polyfil * 10 mm safety eyes ghost plush *blanket yarn *8 mm hook *polyfil *3/4 inch felt eyes cut with my cricut maker **i did not have this pattern tested if i made any mistakes please message me so i can fix it ** please share your finished projects and tag me on social media @theknottynavajo or #theknottynavajo
